NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE0_DESCRIPTION: I'm a technologically advanced personal assistant, powered by data science and artificial intelligence, to help you to live more balanced, successful and happy
TUTORIAL_SLIDE02_TITLE: A solid start and a path for continous improvement
TUTORIAL_SLIDE02_DESCRIPTION: I was built around time-tested principles for conducting a wise and balanced life; borrowing from Epictetus, Stephen Covey and others. But that is just to start, over time, I will evolve to better serve you by adapting to your values, goals and habits.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE021_TITLE: Integrated with popular productivity and wellbeing tools
TUTORIAL_SLIDE021_DESCRIPTION: To make data entry easy, I will be able to read your productivity tools, such as Google Calendar, some popular fitness trackers, and other popular tools that you may be already using. Also, I will be able to help you managing some of those tools.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE03_TITLE: Ok, here is a quick overview
TUTORIAL_SLIDE03_DESCRIPTION: The next slides will summarize our system to give you an initial idea without tiring you with details. You will get into details during the journey
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: 1. Identify everything you care or do or should care in your life.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Take a few moments and think about everything you care, do or should care in your life. Everything. Write down a list. Here is a hint: health, family, your mind, money, friends, home, work, learning, art, adventure, etc. Think long term, think life categories that defines you.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE11_TITLE: 2. Organize everything you care into Luckets
TUTORIAL_SLIDE11_DESCRIPTION: A 'Lucket', is a specific 'life bucket' that represents one or more of those things you care. I will propose you a starting point. Our proposed Luckets will be fine most of the time but you can add, modify or remove some until it represents your life exactly. Everything your ever do should fall into a Lucket
TUTORIAL_SLIDE111_DESCRIPTION: When done with point 1 and 2, you will have one lucket for anything you care. So, forget about stuff outside your luckets.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE12_TITLE: 3. Order the luckets to define your priorities
TUTORIAL_SLIDE12_DESCRIPTION: All luckets are important but some will be more important to you when things go wrong or become tragic or too urgent. There a many ways to define priorities, sometimes is obvious, sometimes is a personal choice. I will propose you some initial order and then we will fine tune it to you
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: 4. Color code the status of all your luckets
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Blue is perfection, should stop. Green is pretty good, keep working. Yellow is warning, do something. Red is really bad, do something asap. White is skip or neglect, maybe is ok. Black is tragic, stop everything and do this.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_EXAMPLE: Example: Say you want to assess the status of your 'Health' lucket. If you feel fit, flexible, thin and nice but you still need to watch out your diet and your gym, put a green. Good job. If you are 5kg overweight, feel tired and having not going to gym recently put a yellow. If you are 20kgs overweight, have knee pain and cannot stop eating ice cream and smoking for breakfast, put a red. I would not use white here, your call, but neglecting your health is a bad strategy. I hope you never put black in this lucket. That is very sad, but may happen, specially is you do not stop that smoking. If you feel like the Dalai Lama going to the Olympics put a blue.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_TITLE: 5. Write activities and goals for the week, month, season, year and beyond
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Life is about doing things within time frames. Humans on earth like sun or moon based time frames and the week is the best unit of planning. Human life also needs longer perspective, try also to write for month, season, year and 5 years.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_EXAMPLE: Example: Say you are assessing your action 'do gym for 30 mins 4 days a week'....to be continued
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3a_TITLE: 6. Size activities using a point system
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3a_DESCRIPTION: Sizing is a critical fine art that can only be learnt by experimenting and doing. Luckets uses a simple, but powerful, idea: points. Think of a point some done that took less than 1 hour aprox. Assign points for what you can do during a day. Most ativities will span many days.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3a_EXAMPLE: Example: Say you are assessing your action 'do gym for 30 mins 4 days a week'....to be continued
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3b_TITLE: 7. Plan your day based on your week goals
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3b_DESCRIPTION: You may have calendar meetings, but be careful, that is not your life.. and you cannot plan inspiration, or human contact, or moods. So, we will dynamically assess the day, goals and moods and decide the best plan. Luckets is a proactive system that puts you in control of your life.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3b_EXAMPLE: Example: Say you are assessing your action 'do gym for 30 mins 4 days a week'....to be continued
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4_TITLE: 8. Assess the status of the activites
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4_DESCRIPTION: Blue means 'done', green 'in progress', white 'skip or neglect', yellow 'warning, needs a attention', red 'trouble, may not happen', black 'dead, no way to do'. Do this for all time frames: day, week, month, etc
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4_EXAMPLE: Example: Say you are assessing your action 'do gym for 30 mins 4 days a week'....to be continued
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4b_TITLE: 9. Tell me how love or hate that lucket
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4b_DESCRIPTION: Not all luckets feel the same. Some luckets stress us a lot, some of them relax you, some are in the middle. Use color coded triagles to tell me how you feel about them. Read is hate, Green is 'Ok', Blue is love.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE4b_EXAMPLE: Example: Say you are assessing your action 'do gym for 30 mins 4 days a week'....to be continued
TUTORIAL_SLIDE5_DESCRIPTION: Humans are cute but complicated. You have feelings that greatly impact your plans. For every lucket assess: general mood, feeling about circumstances, motivation, energy, focus. social need. Color code following same the idea.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE5b_DESCRIPTION: This system is not about taking hard decisions and stick to them for a long time. Is about ccontinously re-assesing, thinking, recalculating what is the best. Periodically, every week, or every day, we will re-asses your luckets and adapt to optimize our plan. Update the status and all indicators often.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE6_DESCRIPTION: Based on the historical data I will be collecting about your luckets, activities, feelings and information about your circunstances I will be continously giving you new advice, new ways to improve. We will be a team to rock the long term.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE_LAST_TITLE: Good job. Now, slow down and relax. Continue when your are ready, maybe tomorrow. Cheers.
